message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000. This is a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $8500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a great value for the product's worth to you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $7000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $8000. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $8200. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product's worth to you.
